alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marion County through 430 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Williston to near Pittman. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Juniper Springs, Lynne, Weirsdale, Sparr, Anthony, Ocklawaha, Moss Bluff and Silver Springs Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion
